author: zahary.
content: <@!557201004060213248>, would you recommend for the teams to wait for some kind of confirmation before making any deposits to the Altona's deposit contract? Since we have `MIN_GENESIS_ACTIVE_VALIDATOR_COUNT` and `MIN_GENESIS_TIME` specified, technically I don't see a problem if we submit our deposits today (Nimbus)

author: donschoe
content: My plan for today is checking in with all the teams to see where they are at. Last week I was asked for having more time.

author: donschoe
content: Also, I might redeploy the contract. So best course of actions right now is getting a coffee while I gather data ðŸ™‚

author: zahary.
content: Alright, but I guess nobody would mind if I make some test transactions later today just to verify that the contract monitoring works as expected?

author: jgm
content: <@!553610810652622860> just a thought: you may want to create your own test contract with a `drain()` so you can retrieve the Ether, in that case.

author: zahary.
content: sure, I know, but testing the precise deployed version doesn't hurt as well
